name: Corporate Manager
description:
Controls:

Click and Drag the tasks (mouse)

Enter: Choose in menu

Escape: Quit game at any time.

Corporate Manager is a game created for the Vimlark2 Jam. You play a Front Desk manager, who's goal it is to gain promotions until you reach the level of Boss of the company. You do this by completing a certain amount of tasks a day while balancing the stress of your employees from overworking before said task goal is completed.
